title: Algorithms to Live By
author: Brian Christian, Tom Griffiths
snippet: They explain how to have better hunches and when to leave things to chance, how to deal with overwhelming choices and how best to connect with others.

title: The Book Thief
author: Markus Zusak
snippet: The country is holding its breath. Death has never been busier, and will be busier still.

title: The Interlligent Investor
author: Benjamin Graham
snippet: It is the most important book you will ever read on making the right decisions to protect your investments and make them a success.
